Package com.example.appointment.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.appointment.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
SQLControllerInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddAppointmentController, AddCustomerController, LoginController, MainController, ReportsController
public class Controller extends Object implements SQLControllerInterface
A base class shared by all the controllers. Provides methods to change scenes that most controllers use in order to reduce code reuse.

  • Method Details

    • changeSceneToLoginController

      public void changeSceneToLoginController(ActionEvent event)
      Changes scenes back to the Login page whenever the Logout button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Takes in that the Logout button was pressed.

    • changeSceneToMainController

      public void changeSceneToMainController(ActionEvent event)
      Changes scene to the main page whenever the cancel button is pressed, or if an item is saved to the database.
      Parameters:
      event - Takes in that a button was pressed.

    • changeSceneToViewCustomersController

      public void changeSceneToViewCustomersController(ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      A method that changes the scene to the view customers page when the view customers radio button is pressed. The view customers page loads its own TableView with the customer data, and aligns directly with the appointment table view.
      Parameters:
      event - Takes in that the View Customers radio button was pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input/output error occurs.
      SQLException - If the database error occurs.
